attributes.review: Terrible app, runs slow and doesn’t provide accurate information. App should be taken down for the troubles it has caused.

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever and if i could i would give it 0 stars it took ages to download and its just a terrible app overall definitely don't suggest downloading

attributes.review: It took a week to download and when I finally got it downloaded it wouldn’t work!! Please fix this app! And the people who made it :)

attributes.review: I was opening the app and was enjoying some news and then 💥boom💥 my phone gets wiped and i have multiple viruses 🦠 and i’m sitting there like 👁👄👁”what have i done “ and now it’s too late 😔~sad yeehaw~
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😨VIRUS

attributes.review: it took 34 weeks to download then another 62 to update. when it finally updated it threatened to kidnap my cat if i didn’t cut off and sell my left pinky😭then spiders poured out of my phone. needless to say DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😣😫
attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND 😖

attributes.review: First it the app took 1,460 days to download (just way too long), then it gave me the creeps and started to do weird things! Wouldn’t recommend to anyone! 🧚🏻‍♂️✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: Just horrible

attributes.title: There’s a lot of people in America

attributes.review: Bruh in was indeed interested in this app but it took 48hours just to download🤬 And when it finally downloaded, I was taking my phone for a walk and the app crashed. Oh my gosh this app is terrible😒😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLY HORRIBLE

attributes.review: As soon as a  I downloaded the app a dangerous virus was put onto my device and hacked all of my apps. It also took my credit card info and spent it all on toys for male pleasure.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: This app took days to download and when it downloaded it slowed down my phone so much that I had to get a new one, this app slowed down my battery and made all apps not work for a bit... DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
